item.title: How to Use Claude Code Effectively: A Step-by-Step Method to Avoid Getting Lost

item.title: Automate AI Prompts with Claude Code Custom Commands
item.description: Learn how Claude Code custom commands eliminate prompt repetition and standardize AI workflows. Complete tutorial with examples, $ARGUMENTS usage, and team implementation strategies. Link to article: https://goatreview.com/automate-ai-prompts-claude-code-custom-commands/
